simplified: 老子英雄儿好汉，老子反动儿混蛋

pronunciation.pinyin: lǎo zi yīng xióng ér hǎo hàn , lǎo zi fǎn dòng ér hún dàn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: lao3 zi5 ying1 xiong2 er2 hao3 han4 , lao3 zi5 fan3 dong4 er2 hun2 dan4

details.simplified: 老子英雄儿好汉，老子反动儿混蛋
details.traditional: 老子英雄兒好漢，老子反動兒混蛋

meanings.value: If the father is a hero, the son is a real man. If the father is a reactionary, the son is a bastard. (Cultural Revolution slogan)
